name: day-matcher-3000
description: When planning children's and youth camps, it is organizationally helpful if the managers do not have to take over the day's leadership for several days in a row. The DayMatcher 3000 helps with the optimal distribution.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -R styles dist/styles && cp index.html dist/ && esbuild scripts/main.js --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/scripts/main.js

author: Till Sanders <mail@till-sanders.de>
